item.title: All Nu Events and Party Rentals
item.description:
About Us

All Nu Events and Party Rentals specializes in providing high-quality rental equipment for events, including tents, chairs, tables, and portable toilets. Our commitment to exceptional service and diverse inventory ensures that your event is both memorable and hassle-free.

Our Services

  • Tent Rentals: Various sizes of quality tents for any occasion
  • Furniture Rentals: Wide selection of chairs and tables
  • Portable Toilets: Clean and well-maintained facilities
  • Event Equipment: Complete event setup solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Allan Mahabir
  • Phone: 290-3700 / 290-3701
  • Email: stormerallan@hotmail.com
  • Social Media: Follow us on Facebook
